WELCOME_DESCRIPTION: A pleasant place to enjoy nature
SERVICES_SUMMARY:
We have a set of services in favor of making your time with us as pleasant as possible,
while your one and only concern is to enjoy
SERVICES_BED_DESCRIPTION: Twice a week, we provide housekeeping and replace your bed sheets and towels
SERVICES_BREAKFAST_DESCRIPTION: Enjoy a delicious breakfast every day of your stay, with toasts, croissants, and the best selection of local mermelades
SERVICES_TV_DESCRIPTION: Flat TVs and the most range of channels right at your fingertip
SERVICES_WIFI_DESCRIPTION: Wireless internet connection for all the devices that you carry on
SERVICES_DEPT_GENERAL:
The condominium has a broad and large park space, with independent parking slot for each department. Likewise, all departments are equipped with an intelligent alarm system monitored 24 hours a day.
The check-in time is set to 15:00hs, while the check-out is set to 10:00hs.
Please reach out to us if you plan on bringing pets.
SERVICES_DEPT_2_SPECS:

LedTV 32'

Bathroom with jacuzzi

Dinning room with:

Deck with barbeque grill, table and chairs
ABOUT_INTRO: City named after the birds that visit this area at dawn and dusk all year round, Las Gaviotas is a small but coquettish bathing resort on the Atlantic coast, located between the towns of Mar de las Pampas and Mar Azul, only 360 kilometers from the City of Buenos Aires
